Hakan Calhanoglu: Hakan Calhanoglu is a Turkish attacking midfielder with great vision and a good goalscoring record
He started his professional career at Karlsruher, scoring 17 goals in 50 league outings to earn a move to Bundesliga side Hamburg
He continued his rich vein of form at Bayer Leverkusen, and it is now a matter of time before he joins one of European powerhouses
